elements.name: Verify user can make a payment after login to the system.

steps.name: User open the EriBank application and go to the Sign in page
User Login to the app with valid Username and Password
User should able to see EriBank homepage
User should see the current payment amount value is <100.00>
User press on the Make Payment button
User input information as the below
User click on the Send Payment button
User click on confirm Yes to send the payment popup
